svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram id="arch" name="Social Network - Lite (Mongo + Fan-out on Write)"> <mxGraphModel dx="2837" dy="1577" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1600" pageHeight="900" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="clients" value="Client App" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="-100" width="160" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gateway" value="API Gateway + Web Application Firewall Rate limiting (Redis)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="-230" width="240" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth" value="Auth Service (JWT/OAuth2)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="-230" width="190" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="user" value="User Service" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="30" width="190" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="social" value="Social Graph Service (Подписки/друзья)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="160" width="255" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="post" value="Post Service" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="630" y="270" width="190" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comment" value="Comment Service" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="360" width="190" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="like" value="Like/Repost Service (Eventual counters)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="470" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="feed" value="Feed Service FAN-OUT ON WRITE" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="570" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="media" value="Media Service" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="455" y="730" width="205" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="broker" value="Event Bus (Kafka)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1490" y="460" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cache" value="Redis Cluster - Hot cache - Rate limit counters" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-360" y="120" width="240" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cdn" value="CDN" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1220" y="750" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="obs" value="Observability (Metrics+Logs+Tracing)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-300" y="500" width="160" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e1" value="HTTPS" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="clients" target="gateway" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e2" value="Authn/Authz" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="auth" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e3" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="user" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e4" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="social" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0019" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e5" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="post" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e6" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="comment" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e7" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="like" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0008" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e8" value="REST" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="feed" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e9" value="Upload/Download" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="media" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e10" value="Rate limit counters" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="cache" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="0.0014" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e20" value="CRUD" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="user" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e21" value="" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="social" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0027" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e22" value="Posts" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="post" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e23" value="Comments" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=52.5;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="comment" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e24" value="Timelines (fan-out writes)" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="feed" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e25" value="" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="like" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="0.34" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e26" value="Store blobs" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="media" target="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-7" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e27" value="" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-7" target="cdn" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e30" value="PostCreated" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="post" target="broker" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e31" value="CommentAdded" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="comment" target="broker" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e32" value="Like/Unlike/Repost" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="like" target="broker" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e33" value="" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="broker" target="feed" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e40" value="Hot reads" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="cache" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="-0.3124" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e50" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="gateway" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e51" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="auth" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e52" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="user" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e53" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="social" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e54" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="post" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e55" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="comment" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e56" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="like" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e57" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="feed" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e58" value="Metrics/Logs/Traces" style="endArrow=block;rounded=0;html=1;" parent="1" source="media" target="obs" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-1" value="MongoDB: timelines (per-user inbox)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="930" y="650" width="180" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-2" value="MongoDB: aggregates" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1230" y="610" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-3" value="MongoDB: comments" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1245" y="280" width="195" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-4" value="MongoDB: posts" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1240" y="190" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-5" value="MongoDB: social_graph" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1240" y="100" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-6" value="MongoDB: users" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1240" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_2YH6KiA7SZzHVbo7KNt-7" value="Object Storage (S3/MinIO)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="830" y="780" width="190" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
